name: Learning Decks Homeschool Playground
tagline: fun, free learning and artistic webapp for kids of all ages
body:
### Welcome to the Learning Decks Homeschool Playground!
We have dozens of Flash based activities for kids, for learning Spanish and English Language Arts, as well as for artistic creative play time. Best of all, it's all free. Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
